technical_indicators.Open: The opening price of the asset for the period
technical_indicators.High: The highest price of the asset during the period
technical_indicators.Low: The lowest price of the asset during the period
technical_indicators.Close: The closing price of the asset for the period
technical_indicators.Volume: The volume of the asset traded during the period
technical_indicators.volume_sma_em: Simple Moving Average of Ease of Movement

fundamental_indicators.CNY_USD_data_Close: Closing value of Chinese Yuan to US Dollar exchange rate
fundamental_indicators.EUR_USD_data_Close: Closing value of Euro to US Dollar exchange rate
fundamental_indicators.GBP_USD_data_Close: Closing value of British Pound to US Dollar exchange rate
fundamental_indicators.RUB_USD_data_Close: Closing value of Russian Ruble to US Dollar exchange rate
fundamental_indicators.SP500_Close: Closing value of S and P 500 index
fundamental_indicators.WTI_crudeoil_data_Close: Closing value of West Texas Intermediate crude oil price
fundamental_indicators.Dow_Jones30_Close: Closing value of Dow Jones 30 index
fundamental_indicators.google_trends: Google trend data related to Bitcoin or cryptocurrency
fundamental_indicators.Tweets: Number of tweets related to Bitcoin or cryptocurrency
fundamental_indicators.US_10Y_Treasury_rate_Close: Closing yield of US 10 year Treasury note
fundamental_indicators.US_Initial_Claims_Close: Number of initial claims for unemployment benefits in the US
fundamental_indicators.MARKET_SIGNALS_market_value_to_realized_: Ratio of market value to realized value of Bitcoin
fundamental_indicators.MARKET_SIGNALS_network_value_to_transact: Ratio of network value to transactions of Bitcoin
fundamental_indicators.MINING_INFORMATION_cost_percent_of_trans: Percentage of transaction volume that goes towards processing costs
fundamental_indicators.MINING_INFORMATION_fees_per_transaction_: Fees per Bitcoin transaction in USD
fundamental_indicators.MINING_INFORMATION_miners_revenue_USD: Revenue of Bitcoin miners in USD
fundamental_indicators.MINING_INFORMATION_total_hash_rate_in_TH: Total hash rate of Bitcoin network in terahashes per second
fundamental_indicators.NETWORK_ACTIVITY_confirmed_transactions_: Number of confirmed Bitcoin transactions per day
fundamental_indicators.NETWORK_ACTIVITY_estimated_transaction_v: Estimated value of Bitcoin transactions in USD
fundamental_indicators.NETWORK_ACTIVITY_output_value_per_day: Output value of Bitcoin per day
fundamental_indicators.NETWORK_ACTIVITY_transactions_excluding_: Number of Bitcoin transactions excluding those involving popular addresses
fundamental_indicators.NETWORK_ACTIVITY_unique_adresses_used: Number of unique Bitcoin addresses used
fundamental_indicators.NETWORK_ACTIVITY_unspent_transaction_out: Number of unspent Bitcoin transaction outputs
